F5 and Red Hat OpenShift Demo¶

Welcome to the F5 NGINX and Red Hat OpenShift Demo for F5 Agility 2022

Attention

The Agility team is using this repo to document our “read-the-docs” process.

The content contained here leverages a full DevOps CI/CD pipeline and is sourced from the GitHub repository at https://github.com/ericzji/nginx-openshift-lab. Bugs and Requests for enhancements can be made by opening an Issue within the repository.

Note

Each Agility lab is typically broken down by “Class” –> “Module” –> “Lab”. Each section uses “toctree” to create the index and reference the content. Using this template should give the contributer several getting-started RST examples.

Contents:

  • Class 1: RHPDS Lab - NGINX Kubernetes Ingress Controller For OpenShift
